data.question: What is ComfyUI-Waveform-Extensions?
data.answer: ComfyUI-Waveform-Extensions is a set of additional audio utilities designed to work on top of the Sample Diffusion ComfyUI Extension.

data.question: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-Waveform-Extensions?
data.answer: The purpose of ComfyUI-Waveform-Extensions is to provide additional audio functionalities for users of the Sample Diffusion ComfyUI Extension, enhancing their experience with audio-related tasks.

data.question: Is ComfyUI-Waveform-Extensions an independent GUI?
data.answer: No, ComfyUI-Waveform-Extensions is not an independent GUI. It is an extension that adds functionality to the existing Sample Diffusion ComfyUI Extension.

data.question: What is the origin of ComfyUI-Waveform-Extensions?
data.answer: ComfyUI-Waveform-Extensions originates from the desire to extend the capabilities of the Sample Diffusion ComfyUI Extension with additional audio utilities.

data.question: Can ComfyUI-Waveform-Extensions be used without the Sample Diffusion ComfyUI Extension?
data.answer: No, ComfyUI-Waveform-Extensions is intended to work on top of the Sample Diffusion ComfyUI Extension and cannot function independently without it.
